fee_rate.description: Defines the fee rate for the loans, e.g., fee_rate = 0.01 means that if you borrow 100untrn, you'll need to return 101untrn.

owner.description: Defines the owner of the contract. The owner can add and remove sources from the contract.

source.description: Defines the address that is going to sponsor the loans. This address needs to grant a (Generic)Authorization to this contract to execute /cosmos.bank.v1beta1.MsgSend on its behalf.

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
